remarks: Value of the group sum operation when every element being summed is an identity of ` G ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Dec-2014.)
statement:
gsumval1.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
gsumval1.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
gsumval1.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
gsumval1.o $e |- O = { x e. B | A. y e. B ( ( x .+ y ) = y /\ ( y .+ x ) = y ) } $.
gsumval1.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. V ) $.
gsumval1.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. W ) $.
gsumval1.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> O ) $.
gsumval1 $p |- ( ph -> ( G gsum F ) = .0. ) $.
$d .+ x y $.
$d B x y $.
